page.title: 13HOME LIFE ELAINE LENNOX.
page.content: The television is a form of home amusement. It is box/shaped and shows four stations.I find that I enjoy the variety of programmes shown each day. My favourites usually involve my passion for horse/riding.I also use the video recorder to tape programmes which I watch when I have time.My home has numerous labour/ saving devices which all assist in making life easier and allowing more time for leisure sports.I attend the local horse/riding school each weekend where I am coached in equistrian arts.Each evening I retire to bed for a good nights sleep although I spend some time reading my favourite novels.When I am ready to fall asleep I snuggle under my soft quilt ,dream sweet dreams and fall fast asleep . Good night.
